title: French spiral herb bread
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon dried active baking yeast', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 teaspoon salt', '450g plain flour', '250ml milk', '4 tablespoons water', '50g butter or margarine', '1 tablespoon distilled vinegar', '80g minced onion', '1 clove garlic, minced', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon minced parsley', '2 tablespoons margarine']
